net.sourceforge.wurfl.core
Interface Device

All Superinterfaces:
InternalDevice
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDevice
public interface Device
extends InternalDevice

This interface represent a device connected to the WURFL application.

It enable the user to obtain the capability of the actual device and other useful info. It hides the WURFL repository structure to the other API parts.

Version:
$Id$

Method Detail

getMatchType

MatchType getMatchType()
Returns:
info about the match type that found the device.

getVirtualCapability

String getVirtualCapability(String name)
                            throws VirtualCapabilityNotDefinedException,
                                   CapabilityNotDefinedException
Returns a device's virtual capability value.

Parameters:
name - The identifier of the requested virtual capability.
Returns:
The value of the virtual capability.
Throws:
VirtualCapabilityNotDefinedException - If the given virtual capability is not defined.
CapabilityNotDefinedException - If this device does not define one of the capablities the given virtual capability needs.

getVirtualCapabilities

Map<String,String> getVirtualCapabilities()
Returns a device's virtual capabilities values by name Map.

Returns:
Map containing couples name-value of all virtual capabilities of the device.

getMarkUp

MarkUp getMarkUp()
Get the MarkUp handled by this device.

Returns:
A MarkUp instance this device can handle.
